alerts.name: NOT_READY_PATH
alerts.description: Dance path is not loaded or is invalid
alerts.recommendations: Upload / reupload path

alerts.name: NOT_READY_NO_XYZ
alerts.description: Dance path is invalid
alerts.recommendations: Check your path file for correctness

alerts.name: NOT_READY_CENTER
alerts.description: Dance center is not defined
alerts.recommendations: Set and upload dance center location

alerts.name: NOT_READY_TIME
alerts.description: Start time is not defined
alerts.recommendations: Set and upload dance start time

alerts.name: NOT_READY_MIN_ALT
alerts.description: Minimum dance altitude is lower then DANCE_MIN_ALT
alerts.recommendations: Check minimum relative altitude. Increase dance center AMSL altitude and upload location

alerts.name: NOT_READY_TKO_ALT_LOW
alerts.description: Takeoff altitude is lower than DANCE_MIN_ALT
alerts.recommendations: Increase value of DANCE_TK_ALT parameter

alerts.name: NOT_READY_FPDIST
alerts.message: First point is too far ({0:F1} m)
alerts.description: First dance point is too far
alerts.recommendations: Check the distance of first dance points relative to drone positions. Set and upload location of needed.

alerts.name: NOT_READY_FENCE_DISABLED
alerts.message: Alt and Circle fences not enabled
alerts.description: Geofence is not enabled
alerts.recommendations: Set and upload fence

alerts.name: NOT_READY_GF_ACTION
alerts.description: Action on geofence breach not set
alerts.recommendations: Set parameter GF_ACTION to either 3 (RTL) or 5 (LAND)

alerts.name: NOT_READY_CBRK_FLIGHTTERM
alerts.description: Flight termination circuit breaker not set.
alerts.recommendations: Set parameter CBRK_FLIGHTTERM = 121212
alerts.DEPRECATED: Since 1.12 version CBRK_FLIGHTTERM is not used during failsaves

alerts.name: NOT_READY_MAX_ALT
alerts.message: Max altitude in path too high ({0:F1} m)
alerts.description: Maximum altitude in the dance is higher than fence altitude
alerts.recommendations: Decrease dance center AMSL altitude and upload location or increase fence altitude

alerts.name: NOT_READY_FPS
alerts.description: Incorrect DANCE_FPS value
alerts.recommendations: Set parameter DANCE_FPS = 4 (or other required value but no higher than 30) or check your Path file if using PathV3

alerts.name: NOT_READY_FENCE_BREACH
alerts.description: Dance path violates geofence
alerts.recommendations: Check and adjust fence and/or dance center settings

alerts.name: NOT_READY_PATH_TYPE
alerts.description: Incorrect dance type set
alerts.recommendations: Set parameter DANCE_TYPE = 0

alerts.name: NOT_READY_AIRBORNE
alerts.description: Vehicle is airborne
alerts.recommendations: Land the vehicle

alerts.name: NOT_READY_XY_SPEED
alerts.message: Max XY speed = {0:F1} m/s, must be less than MPC_XY_VEL_MAX
alerts.description: Maximum horizontal velocity exceeded in path
alerts.recommendations: Make sure that dance does not exceed maximum allowed horizontal velocity or adjust MPC_XY_VEL_MAX

alerts.name: NOT_READY_UP_SPEED
alerts.message: Max UP speed = {0:F1} m/s, must be less than MPC_Z_VEL_MAX_UP
alerts.description: Maximum upward velocity exceeded in path
alerts.recommendations: Make sure that dance does not exceed maximum allowed vertical UP velocity or adjust MPC_Z_VEL_MAX_UP

alerts.name: NOT_READY_DN_SPEED
alerts.message: Max DN speed = {0:F1} m/s, must be less than MPC_Z_VEL_MAX_DN
alerts.description: Maximum downward velocity exceeded in path
alerts.recommendations: Make sure that dance does not exceed maximum allowed vertical DOWN velocity or adjust MPC_Z_VEL_MAX_DN

alerts.name: NOT_READY_RETURN_ALT_HIGH
alerts.description: RTL return altitude exceeds fence altitude
alerts.recommendations: Decrease RTL_RETURN_ALT or increase fence altitude

alerts.name: NOT_READY_DESCEND_ALT_HIGH
alerts.description: RTL descend altitude exceeds fence altitude
alerts.recommendations: Decrease RTL_DESCEND_ALT or increase fence altitude

alerts.name: NOT_READY_TKO_ALT_HIGH
alerts.description: Takeoff altitude exceeds fence altitude
alerts.recommendations: Decrease DANCE_TK_ALT or increase fence altitude

alerts.name: NOT_READY_TKO_VEL
alerts.message: DANCE_TKOFF_VEL = {0:F1} m/s is out of range
alerts.description: Incorrect takeoff velocity set
alerts.recommendations: Set parameter DANCE_TKOFF_VEL = 1.5 , not to be larger than MPC_Z_VEL_MAX_UP

alerts.name: NOT_READY_MVPOS_HVEL
alerts.message: DANCE_MVPOS_HVEL = {0:F1} m/s is out of range
alerts.description: Incorrect horizontal move position velocity set
alerts.recommendations: Set parameter DANCE_MVPOS_HVEL = 2.5 , not to be larger than MPC_XY_VEL_MAX

alerts.name: NOT_READY_MVPOS_VVEL
alerts.message: DANCE_MVPOS_VVEL = {0:F1} m/s is out of range
alerts.description: Incorrect vertical move position velocity set
alerts.recommendations: Set parameter DANCE_MVPOS_VVEL = 1.5 , not to be larger than MPC_Z_VEL_MAX_UP

alerts.name: NOT_READY_TKO_TIME
alerts.message: Takeoff time too short. Allocated ({0:F1}) sec. Missing ({1:F1}) sec.
alerts.description: Takeoff time not sufficient to reach takeoff position
alerts.recommendations: Adjust DANCE_TK_OFF and/or DANCE_MV_POS or decrease takeoff altitude DANCE_TK_ALT

alerts.name: NOT_READY_MTP_TIME_XY
alerts.message: Move-to-pos horizontal time too short Allocated ({0:F1}) sec. Missing ({1:F1}) sec.
alerts.description: Move position time not sufficient to reach first dance position horizontally
alerts.recommendations: Adjust DANCE_MV_POS, DANCE_MVPOS_HVEL value and/or Dance Center position

alerts.name: NOT_READY_TKO_MTP_TIME_Z
alerts.message: Not enough time to gain altitude during tko+mtp. Allocated ({0:F1}) sec. Missing ({1:F1}) sec.
alerts.description: Not enough time to reach takeoff and first dance position
alerts.recommendations: Adjust DANCE_TK_OFF and/or DANCE_MV_POS. Check and adjust takeoff altitude DANCE_TK_ALT and Dance Center altitude

alerts.name: NOT_READY_TKO_MTP_TIME_XY
alerts.message: Not enough time for horizontal move-to-pos. Allocated ({0:F1}) sec. Missing ({1:F1}) sec.
alerts.description: Move position time not sufficient to reach first dance position horizontally
alerts.recommendations: Adjust DANCE_TK_OFF and/or DANCE_MV_POS and/or Dance Center position

alerts.name: NOT_READY_MTP_TIME_Z
alerts.message: Move-to-pos vertical time too short Allocated ({0:F1}) sec. Missing ({1:F1}) sec.
alerts.description: Move position time not sufficient to reach first dance position vertically
alerts.recommendations: Adjust DANCE_MV_POS and/or DANCE_MVPOS_VVEL value and/or Dance Center altitude

alerts.name: NOT_READY_PATH_BUF_SIZE
alerts.message: DANCE_PATH_BUF must be at least 1000 bytes
alerts.description: Buffer size is less than minimum allowed
alerts.recommendations: Set parameter DANCE_PATH_BUF = 18000

alerts.name: INITIAL_CONFIG
alerts.description: Vehicle airframe not selected (initial configuration needed)
alerts.recommendations: Connect vehicle to QGC software and select airframe used

alerts.name: PATH_UNSUPPORTED
alerts.description: Unsupported PATH file version
alerts.recommendations: Update drone firmware to use this PATH file

alerts.name: MODULE_LAG
alerts.description: Flight controller lag
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: MEMORY_LOW
alerts.description: The working memory of your flight controller is almost all used up
alerts.recommendations: Consider disabling some of your flight controller sensors

alerts.name: OUT_OF_MEMORY
alerts.description: Flight controller is our of working memory
alerts.recommendations: Consider disabling some of your flight controller sensors

alerts.name: SD_READ_LAG
alerts.description: SD card read speed is less than expected
alerts.recommendations: Consider changing the SD card or replacing the drone

alerts.name: SD_WRITE_LAG
alerts.description: SD card write speed is less than expected
alerts.recommendations: Consider changing the SD card or replacing the drone

alerts.name: SD_READ_ERROR
alerts.description: The flight controller cannot read from the SD Card
alerts.recommendations: Consider changing the SD card or replacing the drone

alerts.name: SD_WRITE_ERROR
alerts.description: The flight controller cannot write to the SD Card
alerts.recommendations: Consider changing the SD card or replacing the drone

alerts.name: MAG_FAILED
alerts.description: All the available magnetometers have failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: ACC_FAILED
alerts.description: All the available accelerometers have failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: GYRO_FAILED
alerts.description: All the available gyroscopes have failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: PRIMARY_MAG_FAILED
alerts.description: The primary magnetometer has failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: PRIMARY_ACC_FAILED
alerts.description: The primary accelerometer has failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: PRIMARY_GYRO_FAILED
alerts.description: The primary gyroscope has failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: SECONDARY_MAG_FAILED
alerts.description: The secondary magnetometer has failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: SECONDARY_ACC_FAILED
alerts.description: The secondary accelerometer has failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: SECONDARY_GYRO_FAILED
alerts.description: The secondary gyroscope has failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: BARO_FAILED
alerts.description: The barometer has failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: GPS_FAILED
alerts.description: The GPS sensor has failed
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: MAG_NO_CALIB
alerts.description: Magnetometer calibration is pending
alerts.recommendations: Perform magnetometer calibration

alerts.name: ACC_NO_CALIB
alerts.description: Accelerometer calibration is pending
alerts.recommendations: Perform accelerometer calibration

alerts.name: GYRO_NO_CALIB
alerts.description: Gyroscope calibration is pending
alerts.recommendations: Perform gyroscope calibration

alerts.name: GPS_FIX_TYPE
alerts.description: Current GPS fix type is insufficient for flight
alerts.recommendations: Wait to acquire the mimimum required GPS fix or change the vehicle

alerts.name: GPS_EPH
alerts.description: Current GPS fix accuracy is insufficient for flight
alerts.recommendations: Wait to acquire the mimimum required GPS accuracy or change the vehicle

alerts.name: NO_RTCM
alerts.description: Drone is not receiving GPS RTK corrections (RTCM)
alerts.recommendations: Make sure that RTK Tool and Redbutton are configured correctly and WiFi and Secondary channel are connected

alerts.name: VIBRATIONS
alerts.description: Excessive vibrations detected
alerts.recommendations: Inspect the drone and propellers, if problem persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: ACCEL_CLIPPING
alerts.description: Significant impact detected
alerts.recommendations: If the problem occurs before flight, reboot flight controller, if in air, consider changing vehicle

alerts.name: SETPOINT_DEVIATION
alerts.description: Drone is deviating from the expected flight trajectory
alerts.recommendations: Replace the drone and inspect before further flights

alerts.name: POS_TEST_RATIO
alerts.description: Drone cannot estimate its position correctly
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: VEL_TEST_RATIO
alerts.description: Drone cannot estimate its velocity correctly
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: HGT_TEST_RATIO
alerts.description: Drone cannot estimate its altitude correctly
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: MAG_TEST_RATIO
alerts.description: Magnetometer data deviates from other sensor data
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, change the vehicle

alerts.name: ACCEL_BIAS
alerts.description: Accelereometer data deviates from other sensor data
alerts.recommendations: Reboot flight controller. If issue persists, re-calibrate accelerometer

alerts.name: NO_GLOBAL_POS
alerts.description: Drone has not yet acquired its position
alerts.recommendations: Wait for the drone to acquire global position, if problem persists replace the vehicle

alerts.name: WIND
alerts.description: Drone reports high wind conditions
alerts.recommendations: Pay attention! If several drones are reporting this error, consider landing the fleet

alerts.name: CONN_QUALITY
alerts.description: Connectivity issues over WiFi or Secondary channel detected
alerts.recommendations: Make sure that RTK Tool and Redbutton are configured correctly and WiFi and Secondary channel are connected

alerts.name: CONN_QUALITY_BOTH
alerts.description: Connectivity issues over WiFi and Secondary detected
alerts.recommendations: Make sure that RTK Tool and Redbutton are configured correctly and WiFi and Secondary channel are connected

alerts.name: BATTERY
alerts.description: Drone battery is depleted
alerts.recommendations: Replace the battery or land the drone if problem occurs while flying

alerts.name: DIST_TO_FENCE
alerts.description: Vehicle is too close to the geofence
alerts.recommendations: Adjust the geofence or dance center or land the drone if problem occurs while flying

alerts.name: LEVEL_NO_CALIB
alerts.description: Level calibration is pending
alerts.recommendations: Perform level calibration

alerts.name: RC_NO_CALIB
alerts.description: Remote control calibration is pending
alerts.recommendations: Perform remote control calibration (set RC_CHAN_CNT and roll/pitch/yaw/throttle channels)

alerts.name: RC_NO_FLIGHT_MODES
alerts.description: RC flight modes not configured
alerts.recommendations: Configure RC flight modes switch (RC_MAP_FLTMODE should not be zero)

alerts.name: BAT_NO_CONFIG
alerts.description: Battery not configured
alerts.recommendations: Specify number of cells (BAT_N_CELLS and BAT1_N_CELLS)

alerts.name: BAT_NO_STATUS
alerts.description: Battery status not available
alerts.recommendations: Reboot the drone. If it has a smart battery, try replacing it.

alerts.name: PWM_ERROR
alerts.message: PWM configuration or output is bad
alerts.description: PWM configuration or output is bad
alerts.recommendations: Restart the drone, if the alarm has not disapeared check drone's configuration

alerts.name: INITIALIZING
alerts.description: Initialization in progress
alerts.recommendations: Wait until precise position acquired

alerts.name: CONN1_QUALITY
alerts.description: Bad connection on primary channel
alerts.recommendations: Make sure that RTK Tool and Redbutton are configured correctly and WiFi and Secondary channels are connected

alerts.name: CONN2_QUALITY
alerts.description: Bad connection on secondary channel
alerts.recommendations: Make sure that RTK Tool and Redbutton are configured correctly and WiFi and Secondary channels are connected

alerts.name: GPS_TIME
alerts.message: System time differs from GPS time by {0:F0} ms
alerts.description: System time differs from GPS time
alerts.recommendations: Reboot the drone

alerts.name: ESCS_FAILED
alerts.description: ESCs failed
alerts.recommendations: Replace drone (or change COM_ARM_CHK_ESCS to 0 if your ESCs do not support telemetry)

alerts.name: NO_HOME_POS
alerts.description: Home position is not defined
alerts.recommendations: Position accuracy is not enough. Wait for precise position or check GPS quality

alerts.name: EKF_GPS_DIFF
alerts.message: Estimated position differs from GPS by {0:F1} meters
alerts.description: Estimated position differs from GPS position
alerts.recommendations: Inaccurate position estimation. Land the drone if this persists

alerts.name: PATH_ERROR
alerts.description: Path reading failed, hovering
alerts.recommendations: Land the drone and check/replace SD card

alerts.name: MAG_INCONSISTENCY
alerts.description: Compasses inconsistent
alerts.recommendations: Check orientations and recalibrate magnetometers
